markdownRemark.html:
• Aswath Damodaran: he is a finance professor with lots of resource on how to value a company. Part of it is numbers and the other is narrative. Good luck valuing narrative!
  • Michael J. Mauboussin: another finance professor with deep essays. I like his analysis on moat.
